greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Absolute difference between prime factors of n-th semiprime mod n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
mathematica: semiPrimeQ[n_] := Plus @@ Last /@ FactorInteger@ n == 2; f[n_] := Subtract @@ Reverse@ Flatten[ Table[ #[[1]], {#[[2]]}] & /@ FactorInteger@ n]; t = Select[ Range@ 215, semiPrimeQ]; Table[ Mod[ f[ t[[n]]], n], {n, 80}]
results.author: _Juri-Stepan Gerasimov_, Dec 20 2010
